thread.title: Based near two New York Icons
thread.title_full: Based near two New York Icons - Review of Ramada New York/Eastside, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: AlexCliftonvilleKent
title: Based near two New York Icons
text:
Stayed for three nights and the ideal location to see the highlights of the city and experience a bit of New York life.
First room was not good, smelled musty and was very small, also the bedding looked very crumpled and we got the feeling it was not very clean. The night staff offered us a different room and we were very pleased with this, thank you. Basic breakfast and recommend this hotel as good value and a great place to be for a short stay.gt
Room Tip: Tell them what is important to you See more room tips
